attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Specifies the type of value to be accepted. Valid values are: date | time | short_time | both | full

attribute.name: ampm
attribute.description: If true, use 12hr times with AM/PM selector; if false, use 24hr time. Default false.

attribute.name: emptyMonthSelection
attribute.description: Label to be used when displaying an empty month selection

attribute.name: emptyAmpmSelection
attribute.description: Label to be used when displaying an empty ampm selection
